channel.title: Need help connecting java to compiler
channel.description: Ok so i was looking through the tuts on how to connect the java to my compiler so i can compile my things. the problem is that most of the stuff that the guy has in his environmental variables i don't have in there and I'm not sure what to do. Help please!! :eek:

item.title: Need help connecting java to compiler
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Idk…the only think I can think of is trying this
Change javac.exe in this line in your compiler

for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")

To this: (remove the c in javac.exe)

for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\java.exe")

Read full topic

item.source: Need help connecting java to compiler

item.title: Need help connecting java to compiler
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Copy my CLASSPATH and Path values, make sure you have jkd1.6.0_20.

If you need the compiler code for your compiler just right click on the compiler, click edit, and replace everything in there with this-

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic
item.source: Need help connecting java to compiler

item.source: Need help connecting java to compiler

item.title: Need help connecting java to compiler
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

You need to specify the path to your java files on your computer.
Go to my computer > program files > java > jdk > bin
Now copy the code in your file location bar and add java.exe at the end
It looks like

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe

I’ll show you my paths:
CLASSPATH

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin

Thats the newest java ^^^

Path

;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin

Read full topic
